channel.title: Comments on: Shoot Paintballs At Some Iraqi Dude
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
Maybe you should have an RSS for that :)
Iraqi or not, I would like to shoot anyone who's willing to take it up their ass.
item.content:encoded:
Maybe you should have an RSS for that :)

Iraqi or not, I would like to shoot anyone who’s willing to take it up their ass.

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
I know... how disappointing is that? I didn't even get to see him.
Maybe he's just doing an experiment to show the world how much people are happy to shoot paintballs at Iraqis. But who knows... maybe there'll be new ammo some other day (not that I intend to go and check)
item.content:encoded:
I know… how disappointing is that? I didn’t even get to see him.

Maybe he’s just doing an experiment to show the world how much people are happy to shoot paintballs at Iraqis. But who knows… maybe there’ll be new ammo some other day (not that I intend to go and check)

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
Shenanigans!!!
1. The guy walks with a glass screen, and 2. nothing comes out of the gun.
item.content:encoded:
Shenanigans!!!

1. The guy walks with a glass screen, and
2. nothing comes out of the gun.
